sentence.text: Clinical trials have revealed that inhibition of sonic Hedgehog (positive regulation of cell proliferation) signaling or histone deacetylase (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) holds promise as a treatment for liver cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The results revealed that the dual use of the positive regulation of cell proliferation inhibitor and the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II inhibitor effectively synergized to inhibit proliferation, and promote apoptosis in liver cancer cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
